title.rendered: (53) Mango: Making GIS Web Mapping Fast, Simple and Affordable

content.rendered:
Topic:Mango: Making GIS Web Mapping Fast, Simple and Affordable

Author: Chris Brown

Type: Oral

Creating GIS web mapping applications used to be slow, complicated and expensive. You needed servers, software developers, money and most of all time. Mango is revolutionizing web mapping by allowing anyone with a web browser to quickly and easily deploy customized GIS web mapping applications.rnrnIn this presentation you will learn how a small team of developers and GIS geeks from Phnom Penh Cambodia leveraged opensource technologies to build an industry leading product which has been used by its 12,000+ users to create over 30,000 web mapping applications.
